Articles.Content:
Id like to share some flying craft that I have been working on that I have shared with others already and they have requested that I place up on the forum.

**Shadow-2.2**

* * *
Babylon 5 inspired aircraft. 
**Craft File download**

[Get the Shadow-2.2 craft on KerbalX.com](http://kerbalx.com/OneOfAmorphous/Shadow-22)

**Video Link**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PQ3s0SnVjm0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Dragonfly-1.6**

* * *
This craft is inspired by nature itself.
**Craft File download**

[Get the DragonFly-1.6 craft on KerbalX.com](http://kerbalx.com/OneOfAmorphous/DragonFly-16.craft)

**Video Link**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/O5yJIH-7-VE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T08:03:10Z" title="03/07/2015 08:03  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by OneOfAmorphous**
  
More content

Wow! That's a lot of wings... nice job! Welcome to the forums!

-Carlpilot ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Impressive! I'd give it a whirl, myself, except I lack imagination! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The Shadow is almost too real. Don't get a mod that turns it black. And don't add sound effects. Or I may never sleep again.

The Dragonfly OTOH is adorable. Impressive aesthetics on both craft.

Also impressive that you landed both of them by parachute on the island runway without damage, and then took off again.
